name: cypress-todo-app-assignment
description: A full-stack Todo application with React frontend, Node.js backend, and comprehensive Cypress testing framework

scripts.e2e:regression:tests:ci: cypress run --project 'Automation Framework' --env grepTags=@Regression,grepFilterSpecs=true --browser chrome --headless --config video=false,screenshotOnRunFailure=true --reporter cypress-mochawesome-reporter --reporter-options reportDir=cypress/reports,overwrite=false,html=true,json=true
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.install:ci: npm ci --prefer-offline --no-audit && cd 'Todo App/backend' && npm ci --prefer-offline --no-audit && cd '../frontend' && npm ci --prefer-offline --no-audit
scripts.wait:services: for i in {1..30}; do npm run health:check && exit 0 || (echo "⏳ Waiting for services ($i/30)..." && sleep 2); done; echo "❌ Services failed to start"; exit 1
scripts.ci:start-and-wait: npm run start:ci && (npm run wait:services || (echo '⚠️ Health check failed, sleeping 30s' && sleep 30))
scripts.ci:regression: npm run install:ci && npm run ci:start-and-wait && npm run ci:test
scripts.report:merge: npx mochawesome-merge 'Automation Framework/cypress/reports/json/*.json' > 'Automation Framework/cypress/reports/mochawesome.json' && npx marge 'Automation Framework/cypress/reports/mochawesome.json' -f report -o 'Automation Framework/cypress/reports/html'

author: Aashir Ahmed
